page.title: 17WOODHAM VILLAGE SHOP.
page.content: The shop at Woodham Village opened on 14th February 1985. It is in Morrison Close. It sells daily newspapers, magazines, comics, confectionary, tobacco, alcohol, ice cream and all sorts of other things. It opens from 6.30am. until 8.00pm. with an hour closing for lunch at 1.00pm. It even opens on Sundays from 8.00 until midday. Six part-time staff work there. They are all female, four are married, three with families. The other two are 17 and 18 years of age. the youngest is going to take up a post in the army. It is useful to have a small local shop because if you forget something when you do your main shopping in the large supermarket, or if you suddenly run out of something, you can just go round the corner to buy it and then go back round the corner home.
